cons: Smaller hospital so the pay isn't as high as other hospitals in area.

pros: Great company, takes care of it's employees.  Co-workers are pleasant and people treat each other professionally.  Good atmosphere - employees really appear ready to help the patients.
cons: Can't think of anything.  It is a great place to work.  Nice community hospital with a friendly staff and necessary resources to provide good care for patients/customers.

pros: Great co-workers. Small community, like family.
cons: Too many administrators, not enough ancillary employees. Cafeteria serves only one hour in evenings, leftovers from lunch. No guaranteed breaks. Patient  volumes continue to increase without staff compensation.

pros: Competitive pay.  State of the art equipment and resources.  Safe staffing levels and quality patient care.
cons: Not much room for advancement. No additional pay for additional education.  Specialty services not offered due to small rural size of facility.
